name: Survey of screenshot-based CSS testing tools
visualregressiontesting.com
description: Basic collection of links.

name: Selenium
description: Browser automation framework and ecosystem.

name: SlimerJS
description: Scriptable browser like PhantomJS, based on Firefox.

name: trifleJS
description: Headless automation for Internet Explorer.

name: CasperJS
description: Navigation scripting and testing utility for PhantomJS and SlimerJS.

name: Webdriver.io
description: Node.js bindings implementation for the W3C WebDriver protocol.

name: Navalia
description: Browser Automation based on headless Chrome and GraphQL.

name: Chromeless
description: Chrome automation made simple. Runs locally or headless on AWS Lambda.

name: Cypress.io
description: An automation framework that runs in-browser.

name: OSnap
description: The speedy and easy to use Snapshot Testing tool for your project (1200 snapshots will run in under 3 minutes).

name: basset
description: Open source platform for generating and reviewing visual differences. Supports multiple browsers, integrations for github and slack.

name: AyeSpy
description: 44 image comparisons in 90 seconds.

name: Wraith
description: Easy to use ruby tool with docker support.

name: BackstopJS
description: Config-driven automated screenshot test framework.

name: Galen
description: Java framework based on Selenium.

name: Creevey
description: Cross-browser visual testing with magic. Feature-rich tool with UI Runner, Tests Hot Reloading, Docker and Storybook integration.

name: CSSCritic
description: Lightweight CSS regression testing.

name: Spectre
description: Provides image comparison capabilities and an admin interface for managing screenshots.

name: Shoov
description: UI regression and functional testing focused on Drupal 7 sites.

name: qd_screenshottests
description: CasperJS-based UI regression and functional testing focused on Drupal 8 sites.

name: Look-alike
description: Chrome Extension for taking and comparing screenshots.

name: Hardy
description: Selenium-driven, cucumber-powered CSS testing.

name: TestCafe
description: Automated browser testing for the modern web development stack.

name: Needle
description: Needle is a tool for testing visuals with Selenium and nose (Python).

name: gatling
description: Integrated visual RSpec matcher which makes real visual testing easy (Ruby).

name: grunt-photobox
description: Plugin to prevent your project of broken layout via screenshot photo sessions of your site.

name: vrtest
description: JavaScript library for running visual regression tests on your components cross browser via selenium.

name: Happo
description: Visual diffing in CI for user interfaces.

name: reg-cli
description: Visual regression test tool which output easy-to-read single file html report.

name: Nightmare
description: High-level browser automation library based on Electron.

name: Puppeteer
description: Headless Google Chrome Node API.

name: Playwright
description: Node library to automate Chromium, Firefox and WebKit with a single API.

name: reg-suit
description: Visual regression testing suite which compares images, stores snapshots, and notifies the difference to your GitHub repo.

name: Chimp
description: Develop acceptance tests & end-to-end tests with realtime feedback.

name: Differencify
description: A library for visual regression testing using Puppeteer.

name: ResembleJS
description: Analyse and compare images with Javascript and HTML5.

name: Muppeteer
description: Visual regression testing framework for Chrome using Mocha and Puppeteer.

name: ember-visual-test
description: Simple visual regression testing for Ember.

name: AET
description: Scalable testing tool providing visual regression testing, accessibility and performance validation, markup analysis and more.

name: Wendigo
description: Test-oriented browser automation library based on Puppeteer.

name: Loki
description: Visual regression testing for Storybook using Chrome in docker et al.

name: Zombie.js
description: Insanely fast, headless full-stack testing using Node.js.

name: CodeceptJS
description: Modern Era Acceptance Testing Framework for NodeJS.

name: FuncUnit
description: A functional test suite based on jQuery

name: Nightwatch
description: Automated testing and continuous integration framework based on Node.js and using the Webdriver protocol.

name: Protractor
description: E2E test framework for Angular apps.

name: jest-puppeteer-react
description: Visual regression testing with Jest and puppeteer for React components

name: test-crawler
description: Visual regression testing, by crawling a website and providing snapshot comparison reports.

name: wdio-visual-regression
description: Visual regression tool for webdriver.io

name: Selenide
description: Framework powered by Selenium WebDriver for writing easy-to-read and easy-to-maintain automated tests in Java.

name: Karma
description: A test runner by the AngularJS team, that fits all our needs.

name: BrowserStack
description: Free for Open Source. Supports Selenium Webdriver.

name: LambdaTest
description: Perform Automated and Live Interactive Cross Browser Testing on 2000+ Real Browsers and Operating Systems Online.

name: screener.io
description: For React, looks open source.

name: applitools
description: Cloud base visual tests.

name: percy.io
description: Continuous visual reviews for web apps.

name: screenster.io
description: Cloud based automation testing platform for web and mobile UI.

name: browserling
description: LIVE interactive cross-browser testing.

name: Browser Shots
description: Screenshots only.

name: Ghost Inspector
description: See introduction video.

name: CrossBrowserTesting
description: Manual & exploratory testing on 1500+ real browsers and mobile devices.

name: Argos-CI
description: Automate visual regression testing.

name: Diffy
description: Cloud based visual regression tool. Uses puppeteer and proprietary comparison algorithm (detect layout shifts). Great scalability with AWS Lambda.

name: Chromatic
description: Visual testing and UI review for component libraries. Cloud-based. Video

name: VisWiz.io
description: Flexible visual regression testing service.

name: Happo
description: Cloud-based screenshot testing service with support for multiple browsers.

name: Visual Knight
description: Cloud-based visual testing platform with realtime results for testing tools.

name: Axcept
description: Testing for the whole team. Up to 100 tests in parallel. Endpoint Mocking. Code Coverage.

name: Fluxguard
description: Screenshot pixel and DOM change comparisons and regressions.

name: Vidiff
description: Cloud-based visual regression testing across stages.

name: Reflect
description: Visual regression testing and test automation tool.

name: Visual Regression Tracker
description: Open Source selfhosted service for visual regression testing

name: Micoo
description: Open source service for all UI application visual regression solution

name: PhantomJS
description: Scriptable Headless WebKit. No longer maintained since 2 June 2018.

name: PhantomCSS
description: Visual/CSS regression testing with PhantomJS or SlimerJS. No longer maintained since 22 Dec 2017.

name: PhantomFlow
description: Experimental approach to UI testing, based on Decision Trees.

name: DalekJS
description: Automated cross browser testing with JavaScript. No longer maintained since 4 Jun 2017.

name: dpxdt
description: End-to-end testing with Python.

name: Visual Review
description: A human-friendly tool for testing and reviewing visual regressions.

name: Huxley
description: Python framework based on Selenium Webdriver.

name: WebdriverCSS
description: WebdriverCSS sits on top of Webdriver.io and hooks into Selenium.

name: Gemini
description: Feature rich framework with support for Selenium and  CasperJS. Gemini is deprecated, use hermione instead.

name: OcularJS
description: uses PhantomJS.
